title: Come, Ye Sinners, Poor And Needy
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Come, ye sinners, poor and needy,
Weak and wounded, sick and sore;
Jesus ready stands to save you,
Full of pity, love and pow'r.
v2: Come,  ye thirsty, come, and welcome,
Every grace that brings you nigh.
v3: Let not conscience make you linger,
Is to feel your need of Him.
v4: Lost and ruined by the fall;
If you tarry till you're better,
You will never come at all.
c1: I will arise and go to Jesus,
He will embrace me in His arms;
In the arms of my dear Savior,
O, there are ten thousand charms.
